mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sku_shelf_id AS "skuShelfinfo.id", osi.name as "skuShelfinfo.name", a.office_id AS "office.id", so.name AS "office.name", a.user_id AS "user.id", su.name AS "user.name", a.sku_qty AS "skuQty", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", suu.name as "createBy.name", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"

LEFT JOIN sys_office so ON so.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user suu ON suu.id = a.create_id LEFT JOIN biz_op_shelf_info osi on osi.id=a.sku_shelf_id LEFT JOIN biz_custom_center_consultant ccs ON ccs.cust_id=a.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_office s on s.id=ccs.center_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_shop_cart( id, sku_shelf_id, office_id, user_id, sku_qty, status, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{skuShelfinfo.id}, #{office.id}, #{user.id}, #{skuQty}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_shop_cart SET sku_shelf_id = #{skuShelfinfo.id}, office_id = #{office.id}, user_id = #{user.id}, sku_qty = #{skuQty}, create_time = #{createDate}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
